english.segment1: Where did you go?. How have you been?. I'll be right here. Where did you go how have you been?. Are you still my best friend?
english.segment2: We've seen best of times, We've heard worst of lies, But here we still.. Still we stand
english.segment3: Where did you go?. How have you been?. I'll be right here. Where did you go and have you been thinking of remember whens?
english.segment4: And you will take the drivers seat and I will take the captains chair, and you will take the drivers seat, and I will take the drivers chair.
